title: Elementary Science Teaching Competency Enhancement Program Using Technological Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing and operating science experiments using VR/simulation tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Enhancement of experimental design skills using VR/simulation tools in science classes.
Cultivation of the ability to apply at least three types of digital technology-based teaching and learning methods
Development of problem-solving strategies for operating technology-integrated lessons in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
Acquisition of the ability to design an assessment system for technology-enhanced science instruction
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
